column1: Smoque BBQ////Very good bbq. I don't like the slaw(oil and vinegar)
column2: prefer creamy with my que. But everything else is great. Remember: It's bbq
column4: no one cares about peeling paint
column5: we want bbq!! My go-to is the pulled pork
column6: done quite nicely!! The brisket is good
column7: but not great. Ribs are wonderful
column8: I like the St. Louis ribs best! The beans are also great. I don't give it 5 stars because it's expensive
